BIO

“I am a junior software developer who has spent a lot of time learning HTML, CSS and Javascript and other programming tools. I am now ready to start working in a business environment and collaborate with team members to create exciting projects.“

2021 - Current

Selfstudent

Frontend - Javascript, Html and CSS

Made many projects such as:

- A memory game for my end project of the HBO-programma Programmeren in JavaScript
- Created a copy of the front page of CoolBlue website from scratch in HTML and CSS
- Developed a database for books, and a frontend interface to make your own booklist
- A weather API that gets weather data from the user input and shows it back on the screen.
- Programmed a dashboard to replicate a social media homepage
- Built various other HTML, CSS and Javascript projects, such as sign-up forms (including input validation), a calculator application and minigames such as rock paper scissors


2014 - 2020

Tapijtcentrum Nederland

Office worker

- Coordinated various tasks in Distribution centrum, such as calculation of required materials, communicating with suppliers and managing the workflow of the warehouse staff

- Worked with the director of purchasing to ensure an efficient supply chain by ordering the right amount of products at the right time. Including analysis of customer buying behaviour and trends

- Collaborated with the software development (IT) team to improve various processes. An example is an initiative to automate measurement calculation of carpets, wooden floors and stairs through a new software application


- 2014

Senior general secondary education (HAVO)

Science and Health (Natuur & Gezondheid)

following my graduation from a senior general secondary education (HAVO) I decided to work for a family company.
